UserDialog.Title: Kick
UserDialog.Message: This profile cannot currently be used by a Bounty Hunter. You can use it for BH, but it completes 0 class quests for BH's! Feel free to give correctly developed profile syntax and specific places to put said syntax at!

UserDialog.Title: Kick
UserDialog.Message: This profile cannot currently be used by a Warrior. You can use it for Warrior, but it completes 0 class quests for Warrior's! Feel free to give correctly developed profile syntax and specific places to put said syntax at!

UserDialog.Title: Test
UserDialog.Message: Go upstairs and cross the exhaustion bridge. Travel to Hunter (get passed the beams and droids. Press OK when you're at Hunter. You may have to help kill Hunter as well!
